DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effect of ezetimibe and simvastatin given together, and ezetimibe and simvastatin given alone on intestinal cholesterol absorption.
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study to Evaluate MK0653 (Ezetimibe) and Simvastatin, Given Together and Alone, on Intestinal Absorption of Cholesterol (0653-050)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be randomized into 1 of 4 treatment sequences involving 4 consecutive 7-week treatment periods.
DOC.criteria: Healthy males between the ages of 1855 with LDL More than 130, but less than 180 Individuals with drug or substance abuse Individuals with poor mental function Individuals having more than 14 alcoholic drinks a week Individuals that have been treated with any other investigational drug in the last 30 days
